title: JourneyMaker
copy: We’ve put together eight of our favorite journeys for your family to enjoy at home. Check out these downloadable tours below—they’re full of fun activities, inspiring ideas, and much more. To create your own personalized family tour, you can use the JourneyMaker interactive, which equips you with your own customized guide to artworks you select, offering creative ideas for looking at and responding to art together.   Art Journeys   Generous support for JourneyMaker is provided by the Woman’s Board of the Art Institute of Chicago.
